text: @LiamWBZ @CharlieBakerMA said he has an "unlimited need" for medical supplies.This dunce failed to  accurately inventory what is needed IN MA and get the orders.Instead demands @realDonaldTrump deplete the national stockpile resources needed by Wuhan Coronavirus hotspots.Failed Manager!
